CustomBehavior.Text: You meet the level requirement to run this profile.
Moving to Temple of the Forgotten.
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
Waiting 3 seconds - Food check - Mead Basted Caribou.
Distance from portal is not within our proximity, initializing movement to get there.
Our weapon has been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Our weapon has not been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Waiting for the dungeon to load.
We are instance locked, initiating loop procedures until we enter the instance.
Deleting unwanted items from our bags.
Waiting 5 seconds for the mobs to appear.
Targeting the patrol, DO NOT TOUCH !!!
My target is the Flesheating Ghoul, casting Icy Touch/Death Grip.
My target is the Ghoul Tormentor, casting Icy Touch/Death Grip.
No targets available. Initiating scan sequence.
Targeting the King Dred, DO NOT TOUCH !!!
My target is the Flesheating Ghoul, casting Icy Touch/Death Grip.
No targets available. Initiating scan sequence.
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
Waiting 3 seconds - Food check - Mead Basted Caribou.
We are in a level 11+ guild.
We don't have friendly or greater reputation with our guild. Aborting Mobile Banking procedures!
We are not in a level 11+ guild.
Drak'Tharon Keep detected. Running out to reset.
